They tried several different designs. If memory serves correct, only one of=
 the designs actually worked, but it was just an unreasonable amount of eff=
ort for very little output, so they were all busted in the end.

I am sure =
you could find the episode online some where. Sorry I can't remember specif=
ics-it was a long time ago.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Zack W=
idup 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 13, 2010 3:=
29 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My


    

  What free energy machines did t=
hey try to build? There are hundreds of different ideas, designs and concep=
ts out there.

  If it was John Bedini's, I don't doubt it.

  Zack


  On =
Wed, Jan 13, 2010 at 4:24 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostrese=
arch.com> wrote:

      
    =EF=BB=BF 

    They did a MythBusters episode=
 on the free energy machines...BUSTED!!!

      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: don powell 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: W=
ednesday, January 13, 2010 3:07 PM
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My


      =
  

      Well as a great lover of Radio Shack's various projects (150 in 1=
 was my fave), I'm pretty sure you will not be able to build a sweeping AM =
radio from that.  Sorry.  But they are great to learn basic principles from=
.

      Also while the jury is still out on whether or not free energy mac=
hines exist, it is definitely not going to be able to be built using a radi=
o shack learning lab.  Otherwise everyone would have one by now and we woul=
d not need the power companies.

      Don






--------------------------=
------------------------------------------------
      From: Jean Brisson <=
sonny_mtl_can@...>
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Wed,=
 January 13, 2010 3:27:31 PM
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] My

        

      I=
 am too intrested in making my own box. I recieved my Radio Shack Electroni=
cs Learning Lab just a last week from EBay http://cgi.ebay. com/BRAND- NEW-=
ELECTRONICS- LEARNING- LAB-RADIO- SHACK-28- 280_W0QQitemZ150 404642293QQcmd=
ZV iewItemQQptZLH_ DefaultDomain_ 0?hash=3Ditem2304d 0b5f5#shId.
      I be=
lieve I can learn electronics using this kit and YouTube videos.
      I am=
 following a video lesson course on how to use the Electronics leaning Lab =
on YouTube Here's the Link: http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=3DxGHjd88ASNM&=
feature=3Dfvw
      I hope using this electronics kit I can learn to make a=
 box out of it so anyone who knows electronics or this kit will believe and=
 can make something like a ghost radio box. I also believe I can try to mak=
e a few different boxs out of this kit. But does anyone have the diagrames?=
 or the chips/parts? Videos on how too are good also.

      I also would l=
ike to try to make my Eletronics learning Lab into a free energy device. Do=
es any one have any plans on that?
      Here's a YouTube video on that: ht=
tp://www.youtube. com/watch? v=3DEe9uYqFb- OI

      Thanks.
